front.title: Guidelines for Adding Congestion Notification to Protocols that Encapsulate IP

abstract.t: The purpose of this document is to guide the design of congestionnotification in any lower layer protocol that encapsulates IP. Theaim is for explicit congestion signals to propagate consistently fromlower layer protocols into IP. Then the IP internetwork layer canact as a portability layer to carry congestion notification from non-IP-aware congested nodes to the destination transport endpoint.Following these guidelines should assure interworking between newencapsulations of congestion notification, whether specified by theIETF or other standards bodies.
